title: The size of point in LoL
body:
Hi! I have a problem!!
My mouse point in game is very small and I can not see that when I'm in combat
Anybody know how to solve that? :(
My laptop is running win 10, and the screen is 3840x2160
Hope admin will not delete my post :( 
Thank you!

replies.body: Your resolution is really huge, and you may run into problems beyond 1080 especially if on a 4K.  You may need to reduce your resolution down to fix this up, and try not to tab in and out often from your match.  I hope that helps!
